languages.text: {n}Лорд-капитан уединяется в кабинете, дабы предаться размышлениям о грядущем. Спустя некоторое время его мысли прерывает неуверенный стук в дверь.{/n}
{n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лорд-капитан уединяется в кабинете, дабы предаться размышлениям о грядущем. Спустя некоторое время его мысли прерывает неуверенный стук в дверь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to {mf|his|her} study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, {mf|his|her} thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

{n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行商浪人回到书房里，思考着未来可能发生的情况。没过一会儿，他的思绪就被一阵怯生生的敲门声打断了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行商浪人回到书房里，思考着未来可能发生的情况。没过一会儿，他的思绪就被一阵怯生生的敲门声打断了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Lord Captain zieht sich in sein Arbeitszimmer zurück, um über die Zukunft nachzusinnen. Etwas später werden seine Gedanken durch ein schüchternes Klopfen an der Tür unterbrochen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Lord Captain zieht sich in sein Arbeitszimmer zurück, um über die Zukunft nachzusinnen. Etwas später werden seine Gedanken durch ein schüchternes Klopfen an der Tür unterbrochen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} se retire dans son bureau pour réfléchir à l'avenir. Quelques instants plus tard, ses pensées sont interrompues par un timide coup frappé à la porte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} se retire dans son bureau pour réfléchir à l'avenir. Quelques instants plus tard, ses pensées sont interrompues par un timide coup frappé à la porte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Lord Capitán se retira a su estudio para reflexionar sobre lo que depara el futuro. Un rato después, sus pensamientos se ven interrumpidos por unos tímidos golpes en la puerta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lord Capitán se retira a su estudio para reflexionar sobre lo que depara el futuro. Un rato después, sus pensamientos se ven interrumpidos por unos tímidos golpes en la puerta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロード・キャプテンは、この先何が起こるのかを考えるため、書斎に引きこもった。しばらくして、遠慮がちに扉をノックする音に、彼の思考は中断された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・キャプテンは、この先何が起こるのかを考えるため、書斎に引きこもった。しばらくして、遠慮がちに扉をノックする音に、彼の思考は中断された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptan, gelecekte bekleyenleri düşünmek üzere çalışma odasına çekiliyor. Bir süre sonra düşünceleri, çekingen bir kapı tıklatmasıyla yarıda kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retires to his study to ponder what the future holds. A while later, his thoughts are interrupted by a timid knock on the door.{/n}
